entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
